text: So, I've done my own testing and have found a bug. It doesn't matter what object type - but HubSpot doesn't allow for Close Date to be copied from another date picker property. I've tried this multiple ways in sandbox environments. It's always off by a day.
This is a major problem for those using integrations to determine close dates. This needs to be a priority to fix.

Hmm it might be a workflow bug only, maybe copy the property with custom code instead, and if it stills copies 1 day less, you can do an IF branch and fix it if they are different with custom code. If you dont have custom code, you can make the workflow send a webhook to a tool that can copy the date using the API. That way you avoid using the workflow to copy the date since its buggy.
